txt.en: Looking closely at this crude collar, you can see that this is not the handiwork of Elves or dwarves. \n\nPerhaps Ovorlas will be able to discern some measure of insight from the collar. You should deliver it to him at the Elf-camp on the northern edge of Nen Hilith.

'I know this handiwork. It is the handiwork of goblins. We must inform the others in Celondim. If the goblins have grown this aggressive, then we must do what we can to drive them back from our homes.'
You discovered a crude, iron collar on the neck of a wolf in the vale of Nen Hilith. It is possible that the collar may give insight to the trouble that has arisen there.
Bring the iron collar to Ovorlas
Ovorlas is at the Elf-camp on the northern edge of Nen Hilith.\n\nYou should bring the collar to Ovorlas and see if it means anything to him.
